title: referred to in paragraphs (i) to (vi) of subsection (1) of section 12 of that Act on
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Public Health (Alcohol)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Public Health (Alcohol) 

(Labelling) (Amendment) Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited public health (alcohol) (labelling) (amendment) regulation 2025

title: referred to in paragraphs (i) to (vi) of subsection (1) of section 12 of that Act on
heading: 2. The Public Health (Alcohol) (Labelling) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 249
text_raw:
2. The Public Health (Alcohol) (Labelling) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 249 
of 2023) are amended, in Regulation 2, by the substitution of “3 years after the 
date on which they are made.” for “on the 22nd day of May 2026”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 September, 2025. 

JENNIFER CARROLL MACNEILL, 

Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 12th September, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [423] 3

heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the date of coming into operation of the Public Health 
(Alcohol) (Labelling) Regulations (S.I. No. 249/2023) 

 
 
 
 
 4 [423]
